name: Paracetamol Tablets
description: Effective for reducing fever and relieving mild to moderate pain from headaches, menstrual periods, toothaches, backaches, and cold/flu symptoms.

name: Omeprazole Capsules
description: Used to treat certain stomach and esophagus problems (such as acid reflux, ulcers). It works by decreasing the amount of acid your stomach makes.

name: Amoxicillin Antibiotic
description: A commonly prescribed antibiotic used to treat various bacterial infections such as pneumonia, bronchitis, urinary tract infections, and skin infections.

name: Cetirizine Allergy Relief
description: Relieves allergy symptoms such as sneezing, itching, watery eyes, or runny nose caused by hay fever or other allergies.

name: Ibuprofen Gel
description: Topical gel for relief of pain and inflammation associated with minor backache, joint pain, muscle strains, sprains, bruises, and arthritis.

name: Loratadine Tablets
description: Relieves symptoms of hay fever and other allergies, such as runny nose, sneezing, itching, watery eyes, and itching of the throat or nose.

name: Vitamin C Chewable Tablets
description: Boosts the immune system and helps the body fight off infections. Also aids in collagen production for healthy skin and wound healing.

name: Salbutamol Inhaler
description: Relieves symptoms of asthma, bronchitis, and other lung conditions by relaxing muscles in the airways and increasing airflow to the lungs.

name: Dextromethorphan Cough Syrup
description: Suppresses dry, hacking coughs by decreasing activity in the part of the brain that causes coughing. Provides temporary relief from cough due to minor throat and bronchial irritation.

name: Naproxen Sodium Tablets
description: Used to relieve pain from various conditions such as headaches, muscle aches, tendonitis, dental pain, and menstrual cramps. Also reduces swelling and joint stiffness caused by arthritis.

name: Simethicone Gas Relief Drops
description: Relieves symptoms of gas, bloating, and discomfort caused by swallowed air or certain foods. Helps break up gas bubbles in the stomach and intestines.

name: Loperamide Anti-Diarrheal Tablets
description: Helps control symptoms of diarrhea, including loose stools, frequent bowel movements, and abdominal cramping. Slows down bowel movements to reduce the number of bowel movements and make stools less watery.

name: Hydrocortisone Cream
description: Relieves itching, redness, and swelling associated with various skin conditions such as eczema, dermatitis, insect bites, poison ivy, and allergic reactions.

name: Diphenhydramine Sleep Aid Tablets
description: Helps relieve occasional sleeplessness by providing temporary relief from difficulty falling asleep. Also helps reduce the time it takes to fall asleep and improves sleep quality.

name: Mupirocin Antibacterial Ointment
description: Treats skin infections caused by certain bacteria, such as impetigo, folliculitis, and furuncle. Also prevents bacterial growth on the skin and promotes healing.

name: Fluticasone Nasal Spray
description: Relieves symptoms of hay fever or other upper respiratory allergies, such as stuffy or runny nose, itching, and sneezing. Also reduces swelling and inflammation in the nasal passages.

name: Metronidazole Antibiotic
description: Treats bacterial infections of the vagina, stomach, skin, joints, and respiratory tract. Also used to treat certain types of parasites, such as Giardia and amebas.

name: Esomeprazole Magnesium Capsules
description: Used to treat symptoms of gastroesophageal reflux disease (GERD), such as heartburn, acid regurgitation, and difficulty swallowing. Also prevents stomach ulcers caused by NSAIDs.

name: Benzoyl Peroxide Acne Treatment Gel
description: Kills acne-causing bacteria and helps clear up acne pimples, blackheads, and whiteheads. Also helps prevent new acne blemishes from forming.

name: Hydroxyzine Antihistamine Tablets
description: Relieves symptoms of anxiety and tension, such as increased heart rate and sweating. Also used to treat itching caused by allergic reactions and certain skin conditions.
